version_description:
FASTER, SMOOTHER, BETTER!!

It took us a long time coming, but boy do we have an upgrade for you!
1) Works like a dream on iOS 7 now
2) App made lighter, faster and smoother
3) Crashing, text box and other bugs squashed
4) Help added on homescreen
5) Shake to sort can now be turned off
6) Different backgrounds for different folders.
7) Extra bonus for you inside the app
And many other small but valuable enhancements.

Thanks everyone for giving your feedback and comments in helping us make improvements!

* Crashing bug on iOS 5 and iOS 6 squashed
* Bug in restore button squashed
* Improved voice progress bar
* Other performance enhancements

Hope you enjoy this update!
- bug fixes and lots of small improvements

It took us a long time coming, but we’re finally here! Presenting the shiny new StickMe Notes 2.0

We have completely redesigned the app and upgraded all features to run on iPhoneX. Once you update, you will see a brand new icon, completely fresh backgrounds and notes and a super nifty user experience. And don’t worry, all your notes, attachments and folders are still there in this new version.

Keeping up with the new update, we’ve also switched to a subscription model so we can keep the fire burning and support you in getting things done, StickMe style! But for all our old users, the first 3 months are on us. You don’t need to pay anything till then.

Thanks again for all your support and we hope you like this new version.

Bug fixes and new enhancements.
We heard you and we did it!
We have completely redesigned the app and upgraded all features to run on iPhoneX. Once you update, you will see a brand new icon, completely fresh backgrounds and notes and a super nifty user experience. And don’t worry, all your notes, attachments and folders are still there in this new version.
Keeping up with the new update, we’ve also switched to a subscription model so we can keep the fire burning and support you in getting things done, StickMe style! But for all our old users, the first 3 months are on us. You don’t need to pay anything till then.
Thanks again for all your support and we hope you like this new version.

Thanks for your feedback. We heard you and made the following improvements -

1. Personalise your notice board by adding your own images
2. Pinch and zoom to re-size the note
3. Tap and move the note by touching anywhere on the note (earlier this worked on the bottom right corner only)

Hope you enjoy these updates and keep giving us your feedback.

Version 2.4.3 (Sep 18, 2019)

In this build we have fixed bugs and crashes. Hope you enjoy the update!

Version 2.3.32 (June 06, 2019)

Thank you for all the love and support you have sent our way!

In this version we have added some tool tips and pro tips to aid you in using StickMe Notes to its fullest potential.

We hope these improvements will enhance the onboarding experience and will more effectively familiarise you with all the features of the app.

Hope you enjoy the update!

Version 2.3.13 (Nov 15, 2018)

500,000 users and counting! We're stoked to see the love received from all of you over the years. Thanks for your valuable and continued support!
In this build we have made major bug fixes and enhancements.

Version 2.3.34 (July 18, 2019)

We have implemented minor bug fixes and enhancements. Additionally, we added the following -

Ability to enter the app without subscribing

Hope you enjoy the update!

In this build we have fixed some major crashes. Hope you enjoy the update!
